title: Plat/Diamond Support Main - LF Plat/Diamond ADC duo (Silver/Bronze/Iron rank).
body:
MMR decay has put me in Iron 2 but I was a Plat/Diamond support main s7. LF an ADC duo to climb back with. 

Add Holy Fish
